iti92:4.1: “Saṅghāṭikaṇṇe cepi, bhikkhave, bhikkhu gahetvā piṭṭhito piṭṭhito anubandho assa pāde pādaṃ nikkhipanto, so ca hoti abhijjhālu kāmesu tibbasārāgo byāpannacitto paduṭṭhamanasaṅkappo muṭṭhassati asampajāno asamāhito vibbhantacitto pākatindriyo;
iti92:4.2: atha kho so ārakāva mayhaṃ, ahañca tassa.
iti92:4.4: Dhammañhi so, bhikkhave, bhikkhu na passati.
iti92:5.1: Yojanasate cepi so, bhikkhave, bhikkhu vihareyya.
iti92:5.2: So ca hoti anabhijjhālu kāmesu na tibbasārāgo abyāpannacitto apaduṭṭhamanasaṅkappo upaṭṭhitassati sampajāno samāhito ekaggacitto saṃvutindriyo;
iti92:5.3: atha kho so santikeva mayhaṃ, ahañca tassa.
iti92:9.1: Ayampi attho vutto bhagavatā, iti me sutanti.
